text: Ms. Adamson conveyed her best wishes to Vice Admiral Sinniah on his appointment as the new SLN Commander.Australian High Commissioner to Sri Lanka, Bryce Hutchesson was also present on this occasion.The Secretary of the Australian Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade, Ms. Frances Adamson called on the Commander of the Navy, Vice Admiral Travis Sinniah at the Navy Headquarters yesterday (2nd Sept.). Ms. Adamson conveyed her best wishes to Vice Admiral Sinniah on his appointment as the new SLN Commander.Australian High Commissioner to Sri Lanka, Bryce Hutchesson was also present on this occasion.
title: Australian Foreign Affairs and Trade Secretary calls on Navy Commander
